icon_style.CRITICAL: ONLY ONE OBJECT. Never include secondary items, decorations, garnishes, or accessories. Single subject only.

geometry.element_arrangement: single centered object only, no accompaniments

composition.element_count: exactly 1 object, no secondary elements, no decorations, no garnishes
composition.spatial_depth: moderate depth with clear form definition
composition.scale_consistency: strict visual weight consistency across crafts
composition.scene_density: minimal - object only, no props or extras

grounding.method: soft contact grounding (resting on implied surface)

lighting.highlighting: bold highlights to define form and material

textures.material_finish: strong material identity (powdery, liquid, roasted, woven, cooked)
textures.surface_treatment: stylised realism with exaggerated texture cues
textures.detail_level: enough to distinguish at a glance, no micro-noise

color_palette.tone: vibrant and varied - use the full spectrum, not just warm tones
color_palette.value_range: high contrast light-dark separation, avoid muddy midtones
color_palette.color_variety: embrace cool blues, greens, purples alongside warm reds, oranges, yellows
color_palette.usage: each item should have a distinctive dominant color that sets it apart

icon_behavior.interchangeability: visually sits between crops and rares

constraints.single_object: STRICTLY one object per icon - no plates, no utensils, no side items, no garnishes
constraints.no_text: no text, labels, or typography of any kind
constraints.color_distinction: avoid similar colors to nearby items in the set
